ygData.subject: Re: Ports to Luclin
ygData.msgSnippet: Based on the comparison of druid and necro made in earlier entry, I think I would be wise to have some back-up at lvl 34. Barto ... there, ... nuts ... but ...
ygData.messageBody:
Based on the comparison of druid and necro made in earlier entry, I
think I would be wise to have some back-up at lvl 34.

Barto

--- In EverQuest@y..., Spuds McCat <spuds@l...> wrote:
> On Fri, 23 Aug 2002, mlockridge01 wrote:
>
> > Anyone familiar with the Twilight Sea? Since I can port right
there,
> > to the island of the elementals, I was wondering if it would be
nuts
> > to try to solo there at lvl 33? Nice drops from those elementals,
but
> > I may try to get a group up if the solo thing is not workable.
> >
> > Barto Proudfoot
> >
> I could solo on the elemental island with a 33rd mage, pulling
towards the
> castle. Was a bit slow for me, but steady. Note that the castle
guards
> will ignore elementals, and even the undead chasing you about.
